video_prompt: Atmosphere swirls, cloud patterns shift. Ring particles shimmer, light reflects, and celestial objects gently glow.  Across the frame, subtle changes in light suggest a cosmic dawn or dusk.
image_prompt: Vibrant artistic rendition of a gas giant with intricate, glowing amber/golden pixelated rings, set against a dawn/dusk sky. The planet features prominent multi-colored atmospheric bands and swirling clouds. Numerous glowing celestial objects and dark, luminous rocky structures are scattered throughout the rings and background.
refined_video_prompt: Atmospheric currents continuously swirl, cloud formations slowly reshape. Ring particles intensely shimmer, reflecting and refracting light dynamically. Celestial bodies gently pulse with evolving luminescence. The entire frame transitions through subtle, sweeping illumination changes, evoking the grand unfolding of a cosmic dawn or dusk.
